movie_title: Why This Russian Minecraft Griefer Was ARRESTED
introduction: Today we discuss Why This Russian Minecraft Griefer Was ARRESTED & sentenced to 5 years in jail. Was

vocabulary.definition: the act of intentionally causing disruption or annoyance in online video games
vocabulary.example: The player was banned from the game for griefing other users.

vocabulary.definition: a punishment imposed for breaking a rule or law
vocabulary.example: He faced a heavy penalty for his illegal actions.

vocabulary.definition: the inability to believe that something is true or real
vocabulary.example: She stared at the surprising news in disbelief.

vocabulary.definition: a means of expressing or releasing emotions, energy, etc.
vocabulary.example: Painting became his outlet for stress and creativity.

vocabulary.definition: hostility and ill-treatment, especially because of race or political or religious beliefs
vocabulary.example: The group faced persecution for their beliefs.

vocabulary.definition: giving the wrong idea or impression
vocabulary.example: The advertisement was misleading about the product's benefits.
